name: Jumping Joe Car Rush
description:
Jumping Joe Car Rush

Play this game and try to dodge the cars.
You can control Joe with the swipe gesture.
Left, Right, Forward and Back ...
But be quick enough because the moving cars are getting faster.

Come on!
Reach the high score and beat your friends.

As a bonus, you can collect coins and points.
With the collected coins you stand next to Joe, Mac and Sam to disposal.

Have fun ...
dapion
